channel.title: Questions about my server? ( such as how do i advertise it and wat source )
channel.description: Alright I know how to make a server now woot! But! I need to know of this source. A source where the players spawn at Edgeville. Edgeville also has shops and banks and what not so if you know this source plz tell me! Now once I find the source go on it and edit it a bit, how do i advertise? Like IDK what to do... Do i upload the source? or the Moparscape Launcher that I use to enter the server? or what

item.title: Questions about my server? ( such as how do i advertise it and wat source )
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:277226”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=365886.msg2775180#msg2775180 date=1241479485]
ReapageScape… Although you will probably never find a source that will satisfy your needs besides your own.
[/quote]
yea, reapage is like i said above… great for beginners… because it is soo easy to learn compared to most others[/quote]
Delta is easy :mad:

Read full topic
